title: 神奇宝贝野生精灵等级设置
author: liuhaojie.
txt_content:
神奇宝贝mod里怎么设置野生精灵的刷新等级，比如我领一个5级宠物，然后怎么设置刷的宠物与自身等级差不多

注：设置完生成野怪的等级与自己差不多，然后怎么再设置回来？

replies.author: schorsch
replies.txt_content:
# Sets whether or not Pokemon levels are determined by distance from the World's spawn point.
    spawnLevelsByDistance=false
    # Whether or not wild Pokémon will have levels closer to the player's Pokémon.
    spawnLevelsCloserToPlayerLevels=true

config/pixelmon.hocon
在设置里有这两条

可以找一下

游戏中按p里面也可以设置

replies.author: liuhaojie.
replies.txt_content:
schorsch 发表于 2018-9-13 18:54
# Sets whether or not Pokemon levels are determined by distance from the World's spawn point.
    s ...
这翻译过来是啥意思

replies.author: schorsch
replies.txt_content:
是否设置精灵的等级决定于与世界的出生点的距离


精灵的等级是否接近玩家精灵的等级

游戏按p也可以设置 有中文
